amendment.description: Amendment sought to impose community work requirements on adult owners of section 8 housing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide a requirement that each adult owner of housing projects receiving section 8 assistance must contribute not less than 8 hours of work per month (not including political activities) within the community in which the housing is located.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MA) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 341 (Roll no. 122).
